title: Analyze Departmental Spending
description: A manager asks an FP&A analyst to analyze the Marketing department's spending for the year to date.

tasks.description: Retrieve all transactions coded to the Marketing department for the current year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls the detailed transaction data.

tasks.description: Categorize the spending by expense type (e.g., advertising, software, events).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly categorizes the spending and identifies the top 3 spending categories.

tasks.description: Create a summary report with charts to present the findings to the manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clear, visual report summarizing the department's spending.
